column4: Notes
need more loose stops precise timing on the LT day trades! | last minute trading sux
went to the Billa and didn't monitor the trade progress; also it was an unsure trade
* became impatient and went into stupid trades? - maybe no, just have to get used to futures
wtf? Got wreckage :D
tested first 15min trade, got stopped. Starting to get it - entry timing is KEY and keep risk low
could have been green today :)
* from here I started trading more seriously, before I had no friggin' idea
had a few opportunities, but wanted to get in at the perfect moment and missed them. No need to be 100% perfect
da good stuff
Weird chaotic day, nothing was happening except some ES up action which I missed ofc lol | Software margin error for $650?!
Some wrong calls. Entering too early? Should try to follow simple trends?
Got a winner, exited too early on panic/emotion
Was bored because of no action and went into stupid trades
internet stopped just at 17:45, then somebody rang and missed all the trades. Tried to late catch momentum at 21:00 and failed
catched LE's flight to lock, otherwise nothing was happening and had willpower not to do anything stupid :)
2 momentum trades and a lot of patience
Had fear to act because I would lose
* next week more trades
nothing was happening | Lesson: Take profits
bd
Made 2 trend trades as per the plan and had no luck, but missed another 2 out of fear and they would be big winners.. Follow the plan
Don't move up stop losses prematurely | When to exit?
* from them 7 good trades with no luck for 220 and 2 mistakes for 150 (Ctrl+R and tight stop). This got me demoralized for next week. Reduce mistakes
tried some trend trades, but they all reversed :/
angry that I had missed some moves, entered on emotion into trades and lost it ALL. Do not use Ctrl + R, do not enter after missed momentum, do not enter at bad spots
chasing momentum, same as above. THIS - NO MORE!!!
added a new indicator - MA crossover 5/10. Looks very nice - helps to spot early trend changes - can help for enter confirmation and exits. Take profits for momentum trades
trying out the new indicator, looks good
* emotional trades ruined my result…
was careful because Monday, made 1 scalp. Missed some opportunities
check 1-week chart before trades. Missed again trades because of games and not enough focus
starting to get it - trendlines are key, patience is TOP
use Ctrl + D more, especially for exits
Had bad luck with an otherwise hugely winning trade.. Use stop orders for breakout anticipations (TR strategy)
* fine-tuned the default stops and will be using stop orders for entry
US holiday
trading with stops works good so far
more trend trades at LOW RISK points and less jokes now
